verb.description: Experience or cause to experience a slight prickling or stinging sensation.
examples: a standing ovation that tingled your spine

noun.description: A slight prickling or stinging sensation.
examples: she felt a tingle in the back of her neck

origin: Middle English (denoting a small tack): related to Middle High German zingel small tack or hook, probably from a Germanic base meaning fasten. The current sense dates from the late 19th century.
